channel.title: Exile Pk - back out
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/197/7qle.png/][IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/6638/7qle.png[/img][/URL]
[url=http://unixpkwebclient.comyr.com/][SIZE=3]Webclient[/SIZE][/url] || [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/vj0eypqp55n4570/client.jar][SIZE=3]Client download[/SIZE][/url] || [url=http://comingsoon][SIZE=3]Forums - coming soon.[/SIZE][/url]
Hello smexy people, I am re-opening Exile Pk; this time with more, improved exclusive features!
Exile Pk is a login and pk server, alternatively you can boss or use minigames to your advantage (skilling is also available). Just login and have some fun, that's what servers are for right?
[ul][*]Players can now buy custom titles! [*]Cache takes 1 minute to download, then you can begin playing! [*]Perfected hybridding! [*]Weekly pking events and general miscellaneous events! [*]Toggable hitmarks, hit point bar and X10 hits! [*]Fully working PvP items with special attacks including korasi and dragon claws! [*]Stable server, without lagg and a 99.9% uptime. [*]Perfected client sided switching. [*]Superb combat, absolutely fantastic. [*]Killing streak system - the higher your killstreak the better your rewards. [*]Kills and death ratio - there's also a kill store which have a wide variety of items. [*]Manage your kills via our ingame kills scoreboard. [*]Over 10 bosses to battle against. [*]Fun pking zone, for users whom don't wish to lose their items. [*]Jad point system - kill him 5 times to retrieve a tokhaar-kal. [*]Barrows store, pk point store, kill point store, activity point store, etcetera! [*]Perfected EP system - gives your normal loot plus a pvp drop! [*]Over 5 minigames to endure, including Barbarian assault. [*]Randomized PvP loots - when you kill a player. [*]Fully working highscore board, ranking the top 50 best pkers in game! [*]Activity point system - the longer your online the more points you get, spend these on items.[/ul]
And lots more!
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/849/h35d.png/][IMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/5817/h35d.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/836/ga19.png/][IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/4062/ga19.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/138/zsdf.png/][IMG]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/1636/zsdf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/9/gdnr.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/6959/gdnr.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/713/wmsf.png/][IMG]http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/5356/wmsf.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/836/qzzm.png/][IMG]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/8079/qzzm.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/843/1nt.png/][IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/6339/1nt.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/545/zoed.png/][IMG]http://img545.imageshack.us/img545/4197/zoed.png[/img][/URL] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s22.postimg.org/sd1ub0bfl/16gh0cp.png[/img][/url] [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/706/v3b7.png/][IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2702/v3b7.png[/img][/URL] [url=http://postimage.org/][img]http://s9.postimg.org/4jp0v8wy7/bosses.png[/img][/url]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/827/ob5.gif/][IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/8950/ob5.gif[/img][/URL]

item.title: Exile Pk - back out
item.dc:creator: @Dave_is_pro Dave is pro
item.description:
@Dave_is_pro wrote:

OMFG IM IN THE THREAD! ITS ME DAVE LOL

Borderpatrol #1

Im going on ASAP NAKED TACO WILL LIVE ON!

Read full topic

item.title: Exile Pk - back out
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Added magic potions to shop
Added mummies which drop pvp items
Added 2 more sea troll queens in the wilderness
Added a ladder which leads you to a private pking location
Changed the yell timer, so it’s longer
Removed killstreak system
Added a pk point store 2
Changed barrows drops so they’re easier
Made sea troll queen and giant mole drops harder
Made karamel drops easier
Made it so you receive 10 pk points when you create a bank pin.

Read full topic

item.title: Exile Pk - back out
item.dc:creator: @liamp liamp
item.description:

there has been people boosting pkp and kill streaks zay i cough him and took two screen shots so message me and ill show you them

well may as well cross that out considering you dont care… good luck in the future

Hello smexy people, I am re-opening Exile Pk; this time with more, improved exclusive features!

Exile Pk is a login and pk server, alternatively you can boss or use minigames to your advantage (skilling is also available). Just login and have some fun, that’s what servers are for right?
